hero.title: Digital Menus & Ordering Made Simple
hero.subtitle: Create beautiful digital menus, generate QR codes, and let customers order directly from their phones.

features.title: Features & Benefits
features.subtitle: Everything you need to digitize your restaurant menu and enhance the customer experience.

digital.title: Digital Menu Management
digital.description: Create and manage your menu with categories, descriptions, and prices in an intuitive dashboard.

qr.title: QR Code Generation
qr.description: Generate custom QR codes that customers can scan to view your menu on their devices.

ordering.title: Online Ordering
ordering.description: Accept orders directly through the digital menu, reducing wait times and order errors.

accounts.title: Customer Accounts
accounts.description: Customers can create accounts to track their orders and reorder their favorite items.

1.quote: Since implementing 2akel, we've seen a 30% increase in order efficiency and our customers love the ability to browse the menu at their own pace.
1.author: Sarah Johnson

2.quote: The QR code feature has been a game-changer for us. It's reduced our printing costs and allowed us to update our seasonal menu items instantly.
2.author: Michael Chen

3.quote: Our customers appreciate the convenience of ordering from their phones, and it's made our service more efficient during rush hours.
3.author: Lisa Rodriguez

cta.title: Ready to Modernize Your Restaurant?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of restaurants that are enhancing their customer experience with digital menus and ordering.

footer.description: Empowering restaurants with digital menu solutions since 2023.
